translate

Interface PreferenceInputTranslator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CINetToSMVTranslator, TCPNetToSMVTranslator

    public interface PreferenceInputTranslator
    Translates preference input of the type (T)CP-nets with unconditional relative importance and CI-nets into models suitable for model checking by (presently) CadenceSMV, NuSMV.
    Author:
    gsanthan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String convertToSMV(java.lang.String preferenceInputFile, int sampleSize)
      Parses preference input file and saves a file fit for model checking by a model checker.

    • Method Detail

      • convertToSMV

        java.lang.String convertToSMV(java.lang.String preferenceInputFile,
                            int sampleSize)
                              throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                     org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                     java.io.IOException,
                                     javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Parses preference input file and saves a file fit for model checking by a model checker. Presently supported preference input : (T)CP-nets with unconditional relative importance and CI-nets. Presently supported model checkers : CadenceSMV, NuSMV. Translation is based on the theory from the paper "Dominance Testing via Model Checking" Santhanam et al. AAAI 2010 which contains the precise translation rules. Also generates random 'sampleSize' specs, i.e., dominance test cases and adds to the SMV file. Note: Output file syntax is switched according to value set in the constant Constants.CURRENT_MODEL_CHECKER
        Parameters:
        preferenceInputFile -
        sampleSize -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        See Also:
        CINetToSMVTranslator, TCPNetToSMVTranslator
